metadata.title: Epidemic Sound vs Artlist 2025: Best Music for YouTube Creators
metadata.description: Compare Epidemic Sound and Artlist for royalty-free music. Pricing, library size, licensing, and which is best for YouTubers.

hero.headline: Epidemic Sound vs Artlist: Best Music for YouTubers
hero.subheadline: Never worry about copyright claims again. Compare the top two music libraries for content creators.

sections.content: Music makes or breaks YouTube content. Copyright claims can demonetize videos or force takedowns. Epidemic Sound and Artlist both offer worry-free licensing, but their approaches differ significantly. This comparison helps you choose the right music partner.

content.title: Licensing Model
content.description: Epidemic Sound licenses while subscribed. Artlist offers lifetime license for downloads during subscription.

content.title: Sound Effects
content.description: Epidemic includes SFX in subscription. Artlist requires separate Artlist SFX subscription.

content.title: Music Discovery
content.description: Both have excellent search and mood-based browsing. Epidemic's AI recommendations are slightly better.

sections.title: Choose Epidemic Sound If...
content: You want the largest music library
You need stems for custom edits

sections.title: Choose Artlist If...
content: You want lifetime license for downloads
You prefer annual payment for simplicity
You already have sound effects covered
You want to keep music rights if you cancel

faq.question: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
faq.answer: Epidemic Sound: You must remove their music from new content. Artlist: You keep lifetime rights to anything downloaded during subscription. This is a major difference.

faq.question: Will I get copyright claims with these services?
faq.answer: Both services whitelist your channel. You may see Content ID matches but they get cleared automatically. No monetization impact.

faq.question: Can I use this music on multiple platforms?
faq.answer: Yes, both cover YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, podcasts, and more. Check specific terms for commercial use outside social media.

faq.question: Is the music quality professional?
faq.answer: Both libraries feature professional, production-quality music. Many tracks are created by established artists and composers.
